title: Elegant Emerald & Pearl Chandbali Jhumkas - Jadau Inspired
materials: 22K Gold Plated. Simulated Diamonds. Square-cut Emerald Gemstones. Freshwater Pearls. Hyderabadi Polish.
features: Jadau-inspired design with intricate filigree work surrounding the simulated diamonds. The emerald gemstone is set in a square bezel setting. The Jhumka design features a traditional Chandbali shape with layered elements and delicate hanging pearl embellishments. Inspired by the Nizam era jewelry craftsmanship.
occasions: and other festive occasions. Perfect for a Seemantham or Half-Saree Function. Can also be styled with contemporary outfits for a touch of traditional elegance.
description: Exquisite craftsmanship with a Jadau-inspired design that reflects Hyderabad's rich jewelry heritage. The vibrant emeralds provide a captivating contrast to the simulated diamonds and pearls. The lightweight design ensures comfort while adding a touch of regal elegance. A timeless piece that can be passed down as a family heirloom. A classic design with modern updates making it a versatile option.
